name: Inspection of premises and records Note Chapter heading amended by L 1987, c 336, 7; L 1990, c 293, 8. Brownfields cleanup revolving loan fund (repealed June 30, 2007).  L 2002, c 173, 2. Hydrogen fuel research--public and private partnership (repealed July 1, 2006).  L 2001, c 283. Leasing of Hawaii film studio and continuity of film industry branch.  L 1997, c 127, 5, 6. Cross References
text: Inspection of premises and records.  The board shall have the right to inspect, at reasonable hours, the plant, physical facilities, equipment, premises, books, and records of any applicant in connection with the processing of a grant to the applicant. [L 2000, c 285, pt of §2]
